CustomField.description: Goal Sign off date of the project
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(mavenlink__Opportunity__r.Standard_Package_Name__c, "Workgroup"), ISPICKVAL(Project_Type_SM__c, "Standard Onboarding (Webdam)")), KICK_OFF_DATE__c + 84, IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(Project_Type_SM__c, "Workstream Onboarding (Webdam)"), ISPICKVAL(Project_Type_SM__c, "Enterprise Onboarding (Webdam)"), ISPICKVAL(mavenlink__Opportunity__r.Standard_Package_Name__c, "Professional")), KICK_OFF_DATE__c + 112, IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(Project_Type_SM__c, "Elite Onboarding (Webdam)"), ISPICKVAL(mavenlink__Opportunity__r.Standard_Package_Name__c, "Enterprise")), KICK_OFF_DATE__c + 140, IF( ISPICKVAL(Project_Type_SM__c, "8 Session Asset Bank Audit"), KICK_OFF_DATE__c + 70, IF( ISPICKVAL(Project_Type_SM__c, "12 Session Asset Bank Audit"), KICK_OFF_DATE__c + 98, IF( ISPICKVAL(Project_Type_SM__c, "5 Session Workflow Audit"), KICK_OFF_DATE__c + 49,null) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Goal Sign off date of the project
CustomField.label: Goal Sign off Date
